snippet.title: Dark Frontiers Gameplay Preview
snippet.description:
From the Lunar Dunes to The Pole, and all the secrets hidden in-between - Dark Frontiers has much to discover.

Dark Frontiers is a Play 2 Earn / Play 2 Immerse online multiplayer action RPG on the Binance Smart Chain network with its own in-game cryptocurrency - $DARK.

Set in an altered, dark fantasy version of space. Survive on breathtaking but cold and often lifeless planets by fighting and pushing your resourcefulness and creativity to the limit.

Across a shattered alien empire, riches beyond your wildest dreams are guarded by monsters from your darkest nightmares. Quest, explore and earn your way to victory.

Learn more at: https://www.darkfrontiers.com/

Follow Dark Frontiers News and Updates:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkFrontiersGS
Telegram: https://t.me/darkfrontiers
Medium: https://darkfrontiers.medium.com/
